commit message: Noted some TODOs (mostly referring to future functionality though).
Added very basic code to disable a component. Needs a lot of work still.
Improved state change feature: use a background thread, show proper errors.
Warn user when he is disabling system components.
Properly check if a change actually updated the state; if so, strike out the respective components.
Added support for tracking disabled components in db. This took a bit of reworking of some internals.
Slightly improved widget update event text.
Added support for the PHONE_STATE_CHANGED action/intent.
Disable orientation changes to hide our bugs (for now).
Updated help with a lot of info.
Cache components before state change for safety reasons.
Properly switch between 'enable' and 'disable' menu captions.
Sort the list, so that cached components don't change position.
Fixed ugly bug that led to wrong comonents being disabled.
